==== Ubuntu Global Jam, 26th - 28th March 2010 ====
* A great way for the Iowa !LoCo Team to introduce themselves and get involved with the global Ubuntu community.
* Incorporates multiple events, from bug testing and fixing to writing documentation. This gives members of any talent the chance to participate.
* When/Where: Saturday 27th March 2010 <nowiki>[[http://calendar.icpl.org/view.php?did=14970|Meeting Room E (2nd Floor), Iowa City Public Library]]</nowiki>
* More information: UbuntuGlobalJam
